EmailTemplate.description: This email is for API Request
EmailTemplate.name: API Sent Request
EmailTemplate.subject: API Request to update contact
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!User.FirstName},
Your API request for {!Track_Request__c.No_of_Track_Request_Contacts__c} contacts has been successfully sent to Kanlet to track.
Visit {!Track_Log__c.Name} for details Regards, Kanlet Admin
